name: Observee
long_description:
All AI Agents rely on external integrations to become truly useful. Our infrastructure provides AI Agent companies with all the tools that they would need to build in any vertical such as legal, insurance, real estate, healthcare or even dev tools.

Observee provides a Data Ingestion Engine to consume data using APIs and browser agents from any platform and an Action Engine to allow AI agents to take actions using MCPs, tool calls and browsers.

As AI Agents become increasingly prominent for Vertical AI companies, they will rely on Observee for underlying infrastructure.
one_liner: Integrations Infrastructure for Vertical AI companies
